DOC.brief_summary: This study ass safety efficacy SPARC1203 deliver via nasal spray patient allergic rhinitis
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 18 65 year ( inclusive ) history seasonal allergic rhinitis positive skin prick test History presence perennial allergic rhinitis Upper low respiratory tract infection 2 week Visit 2 Significant pulmonary disease allergic rhinitis mild asthma control beta2agonists alone Immunizations vaccination within 4 week prior Visit 1
